explains: adv. 原文如此（通常放在括号内）

sentences.en: "So Dick gets to sic the FBI on you," Frank grumbled.
sentences.cn: “所以迪克指使联邦调查局来追捕你，”弗兰克咕噜道。

sentences.en: On one occasion, he threatened to sic his dogs on a reporter.
sentences.cn: 有一次，他威胁要驱使他的狗去袭击一名记者。

sentences.en: In the law, this crime is called Non compos mentis lex talionis sic transit gloria mundi.
sentences.cn: 在法律上，这种犯罪被称为“乘人之危，诈欺取财”。
